// SOURCE:      var a;
// SOURCE-NEXT: var b;
// SOURCE-NEXT: if (x) {
// SOURCE-NEXT:   a = "a";
// SOURCE-NEXT:   b = "b1";
// SOURCE-NEXT: } else {
// SOURCE-NEXT:   a = "a";
// SOURCE-NEXT:   b = "b2";
// SOURCE-NEXT: }
// SOURCE-NEXT: var a_joined = "a";
// SOURCE-NEXT: var b_joined = b;
// SOURCE-NEXT: var batman = "Batman";
